title: Easter with Snowman Paul
description: Spring is in the air, and Snowman Paul sets his sights on winning the Big Easter Egg Painting Contest. He finds the perfect egg for the occasion, but Miss Hen is not ready to cooperate!Can Snowman Paul convince Miss Hen to entrust him with her precious egg? And are Paulâ€™s painting skills good enough to win this highly competitive Easter Egg contest?Grandparents, parents, and young kids will delight in this rhyming and beautifully illustrated Easter-themed tale. Families will enjoy celebrating the holiday together with this adorable read-aloud.
author: Yossi Lapid
